name: Bunny Dash
description:
Raise and take care of bunnies in this strange garden where they come from cabbages. Feed, pet, and entertain the little fuzz balls so that they can grow big.

Made for the Games on Demand jam based on Hope's game request.

Credits

Programming - M.S.T.O.P. (@QuadolorGames)

Graphics, Music, SFX - Bernice Wong (@cirrus_studios)
